headline: Is Bank of America Offering Value After a 27% 12-Month Rally?
summary: Wondering if Bank of America stock is a bargain right now? You are not alone. Plenty of investors are curious whether the price reflects good value or if it has run ahead of itself. In the last week, Bank of America’s share price edged up 2.9%, continuing a strong year-to-date climb of 18.7% and a very impressive 27.2% gain over the past 12 months. Recent headlines around the sector, including continued market optimism about US banks and renewed investor interest as interest rate...

headline: Berkshire Likely Had a Stellar Quarter. Stock Buybacks Are a Wild Card.
summary: Berkshire Hathaway  is expected to post stellar third-quarter results when it reports earnings on Saturday morning.  As is usual with Berkshire, investors will be focused on cash levels, investment activity, and any stock repurchases as they examine the results.  News of buybacks might come as the biggest surprise because Berkshire hasn’t repurchased any stock since May 2024.
